## isPowerOf2() function

Check if a number is a power of 2.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function isPowerOf2(value: number): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | number | The number to be checked. |

**Returns:**

boolean

true if the number is a power of 2, otherwise false.
